revised_title: Observations on Bee Swarms, Cyder Making, and Tree Transplanting
tldr: This article discusses the author's observations and experiments on bee swarms, cyder making, tree grafting, sap descent, and plant transplanting. The author shares his findings on the influence of grafting on tree growth, the best season for transplanting, and the effect of pruning on tree health. He also explores the relationship between root growth and sap descent, and seeks the opinion of the Royal Society on the matter.
